messages.subject: fyi about stiff( neck) muscles
messages.msgSnippet: hi, i just ran across this book called  body rolling: an experiential approach to complete muscle release by yamuna zake and stephanie golden (
messages.messageBody:
hi,

i just ran across this book called  body rolling: an experiential approach to complete muscle release by yamuna zake and stephanie golden ( http://www.bodylogic.com/ ).   i've read part of it and i'm going to order the balls and try it out.  the book is written for bodyworkers but, with the aid of a book on anatomy (if you don't possess this knowledge already:), i find it very accessible.   one thing is this book is not 'dumbed down'.   anyway i just thought you might want to find an alternative approach to releasing muscle tension.   i for one cannot afford a chiropractor on a regular basis (though my experience has always been positive) and the philosophy of this books is for people to learn a technique which they can: one, have immediate results; and two, become self-healing and not become dependent on a practitioner.

-susan
austin, tx
'unity through diversity'

Susan and Theodore wrote:

 
Love POD....who is up at 5 AM with a stiff neck (I fear the chiro)
